document_data.mainbody: '''''Abi-Dalzim's horrid wilting''''', also known as '''''horrid wilting''''',<ref> was a [[necromancy]] spell that damaged a creature via dehydration.
document_data.Effect: ''Horrid wilting'' caused moisture to evaporate from bodies of living creatures, causing injury. This was particularly harmful to [[water elemental]]s and [[plant creature]]s.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[verbal]], [[somatic]], and [[material component]]s. The material required was a piece of [[sponge]],
